location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Philip Durham Henderson, Foreign Department, Government of India, Simla to Colonel Lewis Pelly, Officiating Agent to the Governor General for Rajpootana [Rājasthān]

mods.abstract: Letter enclosing original Demi-Official correspondence with Colonel John Cheape Brooke regarding Ghulam Ahmed Khan (also known as Alladiya Khan) of Tonk, along with the translated substance of a petition and informing Pelly that Charles Umpherston Aitchison required him to ask Captain James Cavan Berkeley to report definitively on the matter.The correspondence and petition are not enclosed with the letter.
